message.body: Hey lee I've been trying out this studio space on the fourth floor. I'm digging it! Do you think I can really use it?
Hi Sofie I think so Susan has told me yes . I should be in tomorrow I hurt myself so taking day Off today
Eeeeks. U ok? Let me know if there is anything I can do. On Friday we made some progress on the fourth floor. Be sure to check it put
